column1: '''''paur''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "fist", as in a hand clenched around a tool or implement. The [[lenition
column2: lenited]] form '''''baur''''' seems to be able to appear shortened to ''-bor'' (like in ''[[Celebrimbor#Etymology
